joyride.chooseProviderContent: Pick the provider you want to use, make sure you have access to an API key for it.
joyride.getApiKeyContent: Log into the provider's dashboard to find or generate your API key.
joyride.insertApiKeyContent: Paste your API key here to connect and activate the provider.

refreshModelsError: Provider must have base URL and API key configured to fetch models.
noNewModels: No new models found. All available models are already added.
refreshModelsFailed: Failed to fetch models from {{provider}}. Please check your API key and base URL.
noModelFoundDesc: Available models will be listed here. If you don't have any models yet, visit the Hub to download.

addModel.title: Add New Model
addModel.description: Add a new model to the {{provider}} provider.

deleteModel.title: Delete Model: {{modelId}}
deleteModel.description: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone.

deleteProvider.title: Delete Provider
deleteProvider.description: Delete this provider and all its models. This action cannot be undone.
deleteProvider.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this provider? This action cannot be undone.

editModel.title: Edit Model: {{modelId}}
editModel.description: Configure model capabilities by toggling the options below.
